name: LightSpeed (Aghnaths)
description:
Do you want to nostalgic your chilhood game? We bring this to you, control space ship and survived from tons of bad guys trying to destroy your ship. 

Version 1.0

Feature:

- Retro style arcade

-Huge map  to explore

-No limit,simple,lot of fun

-Calm and Sharp gameplay in "Classic Mode"

-Compete your friends in "Competitive Mode", with more enemies,more traps ,and more advantage

-Game over results,contain score,accuracy and more

So,what are you waiting for? Download and Play it now.

Support Me:

Love my game? if you want to support me,write a positive comment,donate some of your wallet :), or...
